text: @atrupar @CANCEL_SAM I believe the amount we dont know about the coronavirus is greater than what we do do know. Transmission vectors could be birds and other animals or worse, the air itself. Thank you @realDonaldTrump for defunding the @CDC and other science programs. #MSNBC #CoronavirusOutbreak

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
